current_version.summary: Security hardening release - CVE fixes, file sanitization, OAuth hardening

completed_tasks.title: Fix frontend CVEs (Next.js, axios, tar, form-data)
completed_tasks.issue: Multiple high/critical CVEs in frontend deps
completed_tasks.fix: npm audit fix - upgraded Next.js 14.2.26->14.2.35, axios->1.12.0, tar->7.6.0, form-data->4.0.4

completed_tasks.title: Fix backend CVEs (nodemailer, body-parser, axios, jws)
Add file name sanitization
completed_tasks.issue: Path traversal vulnerability in S3 storage via unsanitized file.name
completed_tasks.fix: Added sanitizeFileName() with cross-platform path handling (Unix + Windows), null byte removal, length limit. Includes 15 unit tests.

completed_tasks.title: Harden OAuth state cookie
completed_tasks.issue: OAuth state cookie missing httpOnly flag, vulnerable to XSS theft
completed_tasks.fix: Added httpOnly: true, secure: isSecure, maxAge: 10 minutes

completed_tasks.title: Fix logo upload FileTypeValidator
completed_tasks.issue: PNG upload failed due to unescaped slash in regex
completed_tasks.fix: Changed fileType from string to regex: /^image\/png$/

completed_tasks.fix: Tagged v1.14.0, pushed to GitHub, CI built Docker images
